item.title: SpaceX Targets $1.5T Valuation In IPO That Could Become The Biggest Listing Ever: Report
item.description: The move sets up SpaceX for a public debut that could exceed $30 billion in proceeds and top Saudi Aramco’s record listing.

item.title: JPMorgan Stock Slides As Bank Warns Of $105B Expenses In 2026 And Low-Teens Markets Growth For Q4
item.description: The bank flagged a more fragile consumer backdrop and outlined only modest growth in investment-banking fees.

item.title: Nvidia’s China Shipments Hit New Hurdle As US Imposes Security Review On H200 Chips: Report
item.description: Officials are reportedly weighing legal structures that avoid the appearance of an export tax, which is barred under the Constitution.

item.title: OpenAI Hires Slack CEO As Google And Anthropic Intensify The Race Around Its $1.4T AI Push: Report
item.description: OpenAI has reportedly hired Slack CEO Denise Dresser as its new chief revenue officer to strengthen its enterprise AI business amid intensifying compe...

item.title: STAAR Surgical Stock Jumps 10% After Alcon Sweetens Buyout Offer — Investor Says Deal Is ‘Worth Substantially More’
item.description: STAAR rose after Alcon sweetened its offer, though Broadwood insists the company is “worth substantially more.”
